Subskills.name: Tidal Collision
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by lunar orbit.

Subskills.name: Full Moon
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of lunar orbit.

Subskills.name: Crescent Moon
Subskills.description: Lunar orbit is now a toggle that drains a portion of your mana to passively summon moons with increased damage while active. Recasting or running out of mana will deactivate lunar orbit.

Subskills.name: Extrasolar Moons
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of moons in lunar orbit.

Subskills.name: Magnetic Pull
Subskills.description: Increases the orbital speed of lunar orbit.

Subskills.name: Loss of Orbit
Subskills.description: Chance to ricochet towards another nearby monster on hit before returning back to orbit.

Subskills.name: Celestial Collapse
Subskills.description: Chance for moons to explode into shrapnel when expiring dealing a portion of their damage.

Subskills.name: Lunar Cycle
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Devastating Nebula
Subskills.description: Chance to conjure cosmic fog at target location on hit dealing a portion of the damage over time inflicting slow.

Subskills.name: Tidalwaves
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a tsunami towards target location on hit.

Subskills.name: Heavy Core
Subskills.description: Knock monsters back on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Lunar Architect
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of moons in lunar orbit summoning all moons at once.

Subskills.name: Orbit Breakout
Subskills.description: When moons expire they are sent outwards bouncing on walls and terrain.
